item.title: Apple’s Stealthy New Music Upgrade For Windows PCs Beats Microsoft
item.description: A quiet release by Apple means listening to music on a Windows PC is suddenly much better —and beats what Windows Media Player offers.

item.title: Manufacturing Misunderstood: How To Change The Narrative
item.description: Despite being the backbone of modern life and the world's favorite products, manufacturing's public perception often doesn't align with its impact.
